Localization.Name: Basilisk
Localization.Description: Defensive system manufacturer who produces shield systems, ship armor and personal armor for both the military and private sector.

English.Name: Basilisk
English.Description: Defensive system manufacturer who produces shield systems, ship armor and personal armor for both the military and private sector.

Localization.Name: Steward
Localization.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Basilisk
Size: 1
Grade: D
Class: Industrial

The Steward is Basilisk’s entry-level industrial shield generator. Its reinforced housing adds an extra level of durability to an already robust system, guaranteeing that your shield will be projecting even in the harshest conditions.
